fulltext:
Hang Dang Kim (KIM) 
People find me to be an upbeat, self-motivated team player with excellent skills. For the past several 
years I have worked in lead qualification, Events planning and Customer service in the M.I.C.E 
industry. My experience includes successfully planning and idea selling to viable leads. It also 
experiences me with skills of project management, risk management and cost balance as well. I look 
forward to do the same thing for your company even more. 
Bachelor's degree of International Relation Department 
HCMC of University of Foreign Languages and Information Technology  
Graduated : November 2011 
Certificate of Brand Manager 
Vietnam Marketing Communication Academy 
Graduated: March 2016 
Get the real experience on the project " How to improve an exist brand 
become a strong brand?" 
➢ Account Manager (3 years) 
Indochina Heritage Co Ltd., Da Kao Ward, District 1, HCMC 
From October 2017 - Currently Employed 
✓ Plan and manage project for M.I.C.E industry (incentive trips). 
✓ Project leader, Planner, Client services and Event manager 
that all positions I had played for each project.  
✓ Creative Ideas for activities in need.  
✓ Professional timeline management and keep the mission with 
customer well by caring in the details. 
✓ Negotiate to manage risks (risk management). 
✓ Human management to get the perfect target. 
* Account Executive (4 years) 
From October 2012 – to 2017 
✓ Be trained about creative jobs and incentive event planning. 
➢ Event Executive (1 year) 
 Activate Co Ltd., Binh Thanh District, HCMC 
 From Sept 2011 - Sept 2012 
✓ Work as event assistant of event manager. 
✓ Get responsibility of account executive position for not only 
events but also brand activation projects. 
✓ Be trained about creative jobs and event planning. 
✓ Be trained about negotiation skills and time management. 
➢ Sales Representative (1 year & 5 months) 
Financial Prudential – Ton Duc Thang Street, District 1, HCMC  
From August 2009 – March 2011 
✓ Get responsibility of finding target customer, persuade and 
take care customer through loan process. 
✓ Be trained about marketing skills, sale skills, communication 
and understanding customer’s needs. 
✓ Find the market and marketing tips by myself.  
✓ Achieve target continuously on 3 months from beginning. 
Computer skills
